strings.Value: "To forge a spirit into a sword! The things mortals do to prolong their useless struggle to remain in this sick world..."
"Armag's was a sad fate, you're right. But how does that prove we should all just give up and accept the inevitability of the end?"
"There is good and bad in the world. You just can't take your eyes off the bad."
"I don't think Armag fully understood what fate Gorum had prepared for him."
"I don't think he just wanted to stay. I think he wanted keep killing until the end of everything."
